name: Lsss
description:
This is the Latios Space Shooter Sample.  It uses the Latios Framework for Unity DOTS. The full project and source code for the game can be found here. Feel free to make your own variations!

v0.2.0

Controls:

Controls will default to a gamepad controller if one is plugged in.
